description:
North by Northwest (I Sista Minuten)

Description
Roger Thornhill (Cary Grant) is a Manhattan businessman who becomes involved in an international conspiracy when he is mistaken for a spy. Framed for murder, he must track down the real spy before villain Philip Vandamm (James Mason) has him removed from the picture for good.
